result.eng: He was rubbing his hands together.
result.ga: Bhí sé ag cuimilt a dhá lámh dá chéile
result.orig: Bhí sé ag cuimilt a dhá lámh dá chéile
result.html: Bhí sé ag cuimilt a dhá lámh dá chéileHe was rubbing his hands together.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé ag cuimilt a ḋá láṁ dá ċéileHe was rubbing his hands together.

result.ga: Bhí sé ag cuimilt a dhá shúil
result.orig: Bhí sé ag cuimilt a dhá shúil
result.html: Bhí sé ag cuimilt a dhá shúilHe was rubbing his eyes.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé ag cuimilt a ḋá ẛúilHe was rubbing his eyes.
